block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Have you every seen a phoenix fly? This origami paper airplane is the Phoenix plane designed by Andrew Dewar. It is the 37th member of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane challenge. It is quite pretty and is a stable glider. I hope you enjoy it. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 036 : Stealth Wing by Paul Jackson", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/PCrbaTbACXE Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
